articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Japan braced for biggest typhoon in decades
articles.description: Typhoon Hagibis could be the worst to hit Japan since 1958 when more than 1,200 people died.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Fierce battle rages over Syrian border town
articles.description: Turkish forces say they have seized Ras al-Ain as they press the offensive against Kurdish forces.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Eliud Kipchoge breaks two-hour marathon mark by 20 seconds
articles.description: Eliud Kipchoge becomes the first athlete to run a marathon in under two hours, beating the mark by 20 seconds.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: 'Intense' Brexit talks between UK and EU
articles.description: "Technical discussions" are going on after the PM suggested there is a "pathway to a possible deal".

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: What Trump supporters think of impeachment
articles.description: The president fights back against the inquiry at a raucous rally - what do his biggest fans think?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Ecuadorean capital turns into battleground
articles.description: Ecuador sees another day of unrest as protests continue in Quito over the government fuel price hikes.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Slow walking at 45 'a sign of faster ageing'
articles.description: Gait speed in mid-life indicates how fast the brain and body are ageing, researchers found.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US Homeland Security chief steps down
articles.description: Kevin McAleenan was the fourth person to head the agency and oversaw Donald Trump's border policies.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Unique drug for a girl with deadly brain disease
articles.description: Mila is having far fewer - and briefer - seizures after a drug was designed just for her.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: India's Narendra Modi picks litter on beach
articles.description: The Indian Prime Minister launched a 'clean India' campaign in 2014.
